General.Name: Savo Solar Oy
General.Description: Savosolar Oyj, together with its subsidiaries, designs and delivers solar thermal systems in Europe and internationally. It operates in two segments, Renewable Energy and Marine Logistics. The company produces flat plate collectors, collector fields, and turnkey solar thermal systems for use in district heating, industrial process heating, green houses, and mining applications. It also provides dry and bulk cargo services; and produces recycled biofuels from bio-oils, as well as generates recycled oils as industrial by-products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Mikkeli, Finland. Savosolar Oyj operates as a subsidiary of Vg-Shipping Oy.

4.Name: Mr. Antti  Lilleberg
4.Title: VP of Sales & Marketing and  Project Execution
